event.description: Ender Inciarte singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Gregory Polanco.
Dansby Swanson flies out to left fielder Gregory Polanco in foul territory.
Freddie Freeman strikes out swinging.
Matt Kemp flies out sharply to center fielder Starling Marte.
Nick Markakis lines out to shortstop Jordy Mercer.
Brandon Phillips grounds out sharply, shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman Josh Bell.
Adonis Garcia flies out to center fielder Starling Marte.
Kurt Suzuki pops out to third baseman David Freese.
Mike Foltynewicz called out on strikes.
Ender Inciarte bunt grounds out softly to first baseman Josh Bell.
Dansby Swanson strikes out swinging.
Freddie Freeman singles on a ground ball to left fielder Gregory Polanco.
Matt Kemp singles on a ground ball to center fielder Starling Marte. Freddie Freeman to 2nd.
Nick Markakis hit by pitch. Freddie Freeman to 3rd. Matt Kemp to 2nd.
Brandon Phillips grounds into a double play, shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman Josh Bell. Nick Markakis out at 2nd.
Adonis Garcia pops out to second baseman Josh Harrison.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman Josh Bell.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Emilio Bonifacio replaces Eric O'Flaherty.
Emilio Bonifacio reaches on a fielding error by left fielder Gregory Polanco. Emilio Bonifacio to 2nd.
Ender Inciarte doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Andrew McCutchen. Emilio Bonifacio scores.
Dansby Swanson lines out to right fielder Andrew McCutchen.
Freddie Freeman grounds out, first baseman Josh Bell to pitcher Ivan Nova.
Matt Kemp singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Gregory Polanco.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Chase d'Arnaud replaces Matt Kemp.
Nick Markakis hits a ground-rule double (1) on a fly ball to left-center field. Chase d'Arnaud to 3rd.
Brandon Phillips strikes out swinging.
Adonis Garcia grounds out sharply, second baseman Josh Harrison to first baseman Josh Bell.
Pitching Change: Felipe Rivero replaces Ivan Nova, batting 2nd, replacing first baseman Josh Bell.
Defensive Substitution: John Jaso replaces pitcher Ivan Nova, batting 9th, playing first base.
Kurt Suzuki strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Anthony Recker replaces Josh Collmenter.
Anthony Recker strikes out swinging.
Ender Inciarte grounds out, shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman John Jaso.
Pitching Change: Wade LeBlanc replaces Felipe Rivero, batting 2nd, replacing Adam Frazier.
Dansby Swanson singles on a sharp ground ball to third baseman David Freese.
Freddie Freeman grounds into a force out, third baseman David Freese to shortstop Jordy Mercer. Dansby Swanson out at 2nd. Freddie Freeman to 1st.
Chase d'Arnaud singles on a fly ball to center fielder Starling Marte. Freddie Freeman to 2nd.
Nick Markakis doubles (2) on a line drive to center fielder Starling Marte. Freddie Freeman scores. Chase d'Arnaud to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Daniel Hudson replaces Wade LeBlanc, batting 2nd.
Brandon Phillips singles on a line drive to center fielder Starling Marte. Chase d'Arnaud scores. Nick Markakis scores.
Adonis Garcia grounds into a double play, pitcher Daniel Hudson to second baseman Josh Harrison to shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman John Jaso. Brandon Phillips out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Tony Watson replaces Daniel Hudson, batting 2nd.
Phil Gosselin remains in the game as the second baseman.
Defensive switch from second base to third base for Josh Harrison.
Kurt Suzuki hit by pitch.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Tyler Flowers replaces Arodys Vizcaino.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Jace Peterson replaces Kurt Suzuki.
Tyler Flowers grounds out softly, catcher Francisco Cervelli to first baseman John Jaso. Jace Peterson to 2nd.
Ender Inciarte grounds out, second baseman Phil Gosselin to first baseman John Jaso. Jace Peterson to 3rd.
Dansby Swanson lines out to left fielder Gregory Polanco.
Starling Marte strikes out swinging.
